package ${packageName}; <#-- Import List only if there are repeated fields --> <#if fields?some(f -> f.repeated)> import java.util.List; /** * Auto-generated REST DTO for ${className} */ public class ${className} { <#-- Field declarations --> <#list fields as field> private <#if field.repeated>List<${field.javaType}><#else>${field.javaType} ${field.name}; <#-- Getter and Setter methods --> <#list fields as field> public <#if field.repeated>List<${field.javaType}><#else>${field.javaType} get${field.name?cap_first}() { return ${field.name}; } public void set${field.name?cap_first}(<#if field.repeated>List<${field.javaType}><#else>${field.javaType} ${field.name}) { this.${field.name} = ${field.name}; } }
